amendment.description: Amendment to excludes loans insured by the Federal Housing Administration from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 110-450 to exclude loans insured by the Federal Housing Administration from the provisions of the bill.

action.text: Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Brown-Waite, Ginny.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown-Waite, Ginny amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
